spell.name: Ivaldi
entries: You create a 20-foot-radius sphere of fire centered on a point within range. All enemies in an area you designate must make a Dexterity saving throw, being {@condition blinded} and taking {@dice 10d6} radiant damage on a failure, or half as much damage with no blind on a success.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 10d6|5-9|1d6}  radiant, for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Mephistopheles' Iron Throne
entries: You snap your fingers, creating a throne in an unoccupied location of your choice within range. The throne can be warmer or colder than the environment around it, enough to protect you from chill or heat, but not enough to cause or prevent cold or fire damage. It can be sized for Large or smaller creatures, occupying a space up to 10 feet on all sides. The throne can look however you choose.

The throne disappears after the duration, or you can choose to make it disappear early as a bonus action. If you cast this spell again before the previous throne has disappeared, the old throne vanishes, being replaced by the new one.

The credits go to {@link Mephistopheles' Iron Throne, a Bard/Sorcerer/Warlock/Wizard cantrip. For the Evil Overlord on the go, turn any mundane conversation into a sinister speech by having a proper chair to lean back in at all times!|https://www.reddit.com/r/UnearthedArcana/comments/daqn93/mephistopheles_iron_throne_a/}

spell.name: Icy Wind
entries: The creature extends its hand, conjuring 2 blast of freezing air that hits every creature in a line 5 ft. wide and 30 ft. long. Each creature hit by this attack takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) cold damage and has its movement speed decreased by 10 feet until the start of the creature's next turn.

spell.name: Intercept

components.m: a small envelope made of parchment sprinked with dust made from ground crystal and powdered copper

entries: You attempt to intercept the communication from a spell of a creature you choose that is on the same plane of existence as you. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. Ifa target knows you're casting this spell, it can fail the saving throw voluntarily if it wants to be monitored. On a successful save, the target isn't affected, and you can't use this spell against it again for 24 hours. On a failed save, the target is monitored for the duration. When a monitored target casts or is the target of a spell that allows it to converse with another creature, you can experience the conversation as though you were the intended recipient. When you intercept the conversation, you have the following options:

items: You can allow the conversation to reach its intended recipient, able to listen to all parties involved for the duration, but you cannot converse yourself.
You can cause the conversation to stop with you, with no indictation that the spell has not reached its intended.

You can reply as if you were the intended recipient. A creature that uses its action to listen to the cadence and inflection of the reply can determine that you are an imposter with a successful Wisdom (Insight) check against your spell save DC.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a 9th-level spell slot, the duration is 24 hours.
